message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40, I'm the one making the first offer after all!
Let's flip the script - 60/40 for me this time!  It's a fair trade, considering I rejected your offer. We can avoid the inflation and both get more.
I'm willing to compromise, let's meet in the middle and split it 58-42. Inflation is eating away at our money, let's be reasonable!
